text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Spe? You haven't changed your<n>clothes yet. Did the zipper
get stuck?<n>Should I fix it?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm sorry! Nothing's wrong with it!<n>I'm just feeling kinda...
starstruck, I<n>guess.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
It's hard to explain, but everything I<n>saw from up onstage—it
was amazing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I'd like to see it with you again<n>someday.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ah! Me too! Let's do it again, Suzuka!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Come on, come on! Quit slacking off,<n>you two! We gotta get
ready to<n>m-o-v-e move!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You don't want the after-party to start<n>without us, do you?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Talk about a luxurious feast!<n>This is way more than I
expected!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Dunno if you've noticed, Spe, but thiskind of party's called an after-partybecause with this amount of food,your tummy will be hanging low longafter the party!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Honestly... I'm just astonished by<n>what comes out of your
mouth<n>sometimes.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ooh! Is that a compliment from the<n>one and only, the most
venerable<n>McQueen? I am most honorably<n>honored. ☆

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That wasn't a compliment in the<n>slightest!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Haha! Guess I'm in charge of taking<n>all McQueen's extra
sweets to help<n>her not overeat.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I-I don't need any such kind of help!<n>I'll show you, this is
self-restraint<n>befitting the Mejiro name.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Maybe we should start getting<n>food. Yeah, Spe?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Mmph... I'll get some later... I just<n>need some time...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hey, c'mon... Sheesh, the so-called<n>honor student's really
wiped herself<n>out, huh? ...Wait here, I'll go grab us<n>
somethin'!
